00027 #ifndef _ShaderMaterialSerializerListener_
00028 #define _ShaderMaterialSerializerListener_
00029

00032 #include "OgreShaderGenerator.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 namespace RTShader {
00036 
00047 class _OgreRTSSExport SGMaterialSerializerListener : public MaterialSerializer::Listener, public RTShaderSystemAlloc
00048 {
00049 
00050 // Interface.
00051 public:
00052 
00056     virtual void materialEventRaised(MaterialSerializer* ser, 
00057         MaterialSerializer::SerializeEvent event, bool& skip, const Material* mat);
00058 
00062     virtual void techniqueEventRaised(MaterialSerializer* ser, 
00063         MaterialSerializer::SerializeEvent event, bool& skip, const Technique* tech);
00064 
00068     virtual void passEventRaised(MaterialSerializer* ser, 
00069         MaterialSerializer::SerializeEvent event, bool& skip, const Pass* tech);
00070 
00074     virtual void textureUnitStateEventRaised(MaterialSerializer* ser, 
00075         MaterialSerializer::SerializeEvent event, bool& skip, const TextureUnitState* textureUnit);
00076   
00077 // Types.
00078 protected:
00079     typedef vector<ShaderGenerator::SGPass*>::type  SGPassList;
00080     typedef SGPassList::iterator                    SGPassListIterator;
00081     typedef SGPassList::const_iterator              SGPassListConstIterator;
00082 
00083 // Protected methods.
00084 protected:
00086     SGMaterialSerializerListener();
00087     ~SGMaterialSerializerListener();
00088 
00090     void createSGPassList(Material* mat, SGPassList& passList);
00091 
00093     ShaderGenerator::SGPass*    getShaderGeneratedPass  (const Pass* srcPass);
00094     
00095 
00096 // Attributes.
00097 protected:  
00098     // The current source material that is being written.
00099     Material* mSourceMaterial;
00100     // List of SGPass instances composing this material.
00101     SGPassList mSGPassList;
00102     
00103     
00104 private:

00106 };
